parameters.name: ParentCount
parameters.description: Number of parent features for this macro feature

parameters.name: PFeatures
parameters.description: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of parent features VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.

title: IMacroFeatureData.ISetParents
description: Sets the parent features for this macro feature.
signature:
void ISetParents( 
   System.Int32
ParentCount
,
   ref Feature
PFeatures
)

parameters.name: ParentCount
parameters.description: Number of parent features for this macro feature

parameters.name: PFeatures
parameters.description: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of parent features VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.

remarks:
Parent features set by this method are not persistent when the macro feature is regenerated. Reset the parent features in the
SwComFeature::Regenerate
handler.
